categories: Baby Cap Cool Daily Sun Hoody
description:
Go forth with the technical wizardry of Patagonia® fabrics that block more than 98% of harmful UV. The lightweight material is the same used for grown-up base layers. With lots of coverage and a nice deep hood, the the Baby Capilene® Cool Daily Sun Hoody is perfect for warm weather adventures.Made of polyester and recycled polyester, heathered fabrics are 50% recycled, solids are 100% recycled.HeiQ® Fresh treatment.3-panel hood adds sun coverage.Flat seams reduce chafing and improve mobility.Raglan sleeves for unrestricted movement.

        Sustainability
